description.short: A striking indoor plant with large, perforated leaves.
description.preview: Monstera Deliciosa is known for its large, glossy leaves and easy maintenance.
description.full: Monstera Deliciosa, also called the Swiss Cheese Plant, is a popular houseplant due to its dramatic foliage and adaptability. It thrives in bright, indirect light and adds a tropical feel to any interior.

description.short: A stunning outdoor tree with vibrant red foliage.
description.preview: The Japanese Maple brings a splash of color to any garden with its brilliant red leaves.
description.full: The Japanese Maple is a deciduous tree that is prized for its delicate leaves and vivid colors. It prefers partial shade and well-drained soil, making it a favorite for landscaping.

description.short: A hardy succulent with medicinal properties.
description.preview: Aloe Vera is a versatile plant known for its soothing gel and minimal care requirements.
description.full: Aloe Vera is a succulent that thrives in bright, indirect sunlight. Its leaves contain a gel used for soothing burns and skin irritations, making it a useful addition to any home.

description.short: A delicate flowering plant with exotic blooms.
description.preview: Orchids are a symbol of elegance, producing stunning flowers in various colors.
description.full: Orchids are epiphytic plants that require bright, indirect light and high humidity. Their flowers are long-lasting and come in an array of colors, making them a favorite among indoor plant enthusiasts.

description.short: A robust indoor plant that tolerates neglect.
description.preview: The Snake Plant is perfect for beginners, requiring minimal care and water.
description.full: Snake Plants, also known as Mother-in-Law's Tongue, are hardy plants that thrive in low light and can survive infrequent watering. They are also excellent at purifying air.

description.short: A lush green plant that thrives in humid environments.
description.preview: Ferns add a touch of greenery to shaded spaces with their delicate fronds.
description.full: Ferns are moisture-loving plants that thrive in indirect light and high humidity. They are ideal for bathrooms or shaded corners of gardens, bringing a fresh, natural feel to the environment.

description.short: A flowering plant with vibrant, tropical blooms.
description.preview: Hibiscus plants bring a splash of tropical color to gardens and patios.
description.full: Hibiscus is a fast-growing flowering plant that thrives in full sun and well-drained soil. Its large, colorful blooms are a favorite among gardeners looking to create a tropical oasis.
